thread.title: Cute Hotel Near the Eiffel Tower
thread.title_full: Cute Hotel Near the Eiffel Tower - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PhilKay92
title: Cute Hotel Near the Eiffel Tower
text: This little cute hotel is few steps away from the Eiffel Tower and just in front of a Metro station. The triple room we had however was a bit small for three persons. What we loved with this hotel was their breakfast. If you've been to some big chain hotels don't expect much from this hotel.
